setbuiltyear(e.target.value)} /> setview(e.target.value)} /> setparkingspace(e.target.value)} /> e.target.checked === true ? setdoublegazedwindows("Y") : setdoublegazedwindows("N") } > Double Glazed Windows e.target.checked === true ? setcentralair("Y") : setcentralair("N") } > Central Air Conditioning e.target.checked === true ? setcentralheat("Y") : setcentralheat("N") } > Central Heating e.target.checked === true ? setwaste("Y") : setwaste("N") } > Waste Disposal setfloors(e.target.value)} /> setothermainfeatures(e.target.value)} /> e.target.checked === true ? setfurnished("Y") : setfurnished("N") } > Furnished
